programme.title: Close Encounters Down Under
programme.desc: Queensland's Tropical Coast: Delve into the incredible collection of UFO stories of first-hand witnesses, from flying saucers to strange encounters in sugar cane fields. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Medical Mysteries: Medics at a hospital fall gravely ill after treating a mysteriously ailing patient in a circumstance that can't be explained by science. Or can it? (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Gold at Gunpoint: The Golds visits Les' grandfather's closed down pawn shop in downtown Detroit, and Les tells the story of a frightening incident. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Power of the Talisman: For millennia, people have believed that everyday objects can possess hidden energy. These talismans are seen to provide protection and good fortune. (S15, ep 20)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Mysteries of Scotland: Home to mysterious stone circles, stories of strange beings and reported sightings, Scotland has always been an epicentre of otherworldly phenomena. (S16, ep 8)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: New. Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 20)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: You Can Lead a Horse to a Locker: Barry and Kenny show up in their alternative fuel vehicle. Meanwhile, Lisa does her best to break the curse of the bad locker. (S14, ep 3)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Piles to Go Before I Keep: Laura takes the reins in Fullerton and outsells Dan. Brandi gets assaulted by her locker and Darrell stumbles across an unexpected collection. (S14, ep 4)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Pain in the Membrane: Ivy's locker shines some light on the business, while Lisa learns that she needs her locker about as much as she needs a hole in her head. (S14, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: How the West Covina Was Won: Lisa makes a big mistake as she's too busy looking back. Meanwhile, Rene gets his hands on a bargain and makes the most of it. (S14, ep 6)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: The Champ: Troy and Terral protect a friend's fish camp with the help of their ace-in-the-hole sniper. The Edwards go toe-to-toe with a heavyweight gator known as The Champ. (S11, ep 3)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Mystery In The Bayou: With them not catching any Gators, Troy and Terral test a radical new strategy, while Jacob's new deckhand tries to prove his worth. (S11, ep 4)

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Bad Banana: Ronnie's day takes a turn for the worse when Ashley discovers a bad omen on board, while young hunters Brock and Aaron gamble on a new hunting area. (S11, ep 5)

programme.title: Seized At Sea
programme.desc: Agents investigate a small boat crewed by three men on a well-known smuggling route, only to confirm the men have a shady past. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Airport Security USA
programme.desc: Passengers are searched for illegal objects when entering and leaving the United States by the Department of Homeland Security's Customs and Border Protection officers. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Airborne Attack: Anthrax is the most feared of all biological weapons, so when spores were found inside a letter sent through US mail in 2001, an entire nation was terrified. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Deadly Jet Collision: Explore the events surrounding one of the worst aviation disasters in history, when 71 people died after two 747 cargo jets collided. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Top Ten Alien Craft: Count down the top ten alien craft, from V-shaped objects to orbs of light to flying saucers. (S15, ep 14)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Edgar Cayce - The Sleeping Prophet: In the 1900s, a modern-day prophet Edgar Cayce became a worldwide sensation. He claimed to receive visions of both the past and future. (S15, ep 16)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Top Ten Mysteries of the Deep: Count down the top ten mysteries of the deep, from sunken continents to supposed proof of the lost city of Atlantis. (S15, ep 17)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Gods of Greece: Explore whether the Gods of Greece including Zeus, Apollo and Poseidon, were actually extra-terrestrial visitors to Earth. (S15, ep 18)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Power of the Talisman: For millennia, people have believed that everyday objects can possess hidden energy. These talismans are seen to provide protection and good fortune. (S15, ep 20)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens 16
programme.desc: Secrets of the Sumerians: When the ancient Sumerians built their civilisation, they credited their gods - but were these powerful beings actually extraterrestrial visitors? (S16, ep 7)

programme.title: Nostradamus: 21st Century Prophecies Revealed
programme.desc: How did a Frenchman living in the 16th century predict so many modern-day disasters? This special explores how one person could see into the future.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: America's Loch Ness Monster: A Loch Ness Monster-esque creature is recorded in America, experts analyse evidence of a giant scaly egg, and birds are vaporized by a death ray. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: Curse of the Mayan Treasure: An explorer at a Mayan sacrificial site is attacked by an underwater fog, thousands of fish jump to their deaths, and a UFO is spotted in LA skies. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: A priest, showing the same crucifixion wounds as Jesus Christ, claims to have suffered from stigmata. Experts investigate whether his story is true or just a religious hoax. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: A priest, showing the same crucifixion wounds as Jesus Christ, claims to have suffered from stigmata. Experts investigate whether his story is true or just a religious hoax. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: Keith Farquharson: Will Mellor and a panel of experts uncover the shocking case of ex-traffic officer Keith Farquharson, found guilty of murdering his wife Alice in 2019. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: Officer Ken and his team track down an illegal immigrant with a history of domestic violence, while an Indian national faces deportation after overstaying his holiday visa. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Palmerstone North Delta team is on the job fighting crime, while Customs pooch Yarra sniffs out a dodgy delivery. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Delta unit Kieran and Vader vamoose after a fleeing driver in Hamilton, while drug-seeking Yarra is in pursuit of something unsanitary. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Skulls & Scoundrels: The Golds' good reputation is at stake, when a customer claims he was sold a fake watch, and Ashley offers a customer way over the odds for some gemstones. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Gambler: Les is forced to call security when a row over a missing item turns violent, a gambler drops in for funds and a customer tries to shift a gynaecologist's table. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Fool's Gold: Les causes drama when he tells a woman her gold bracelet is fake. Later, it's Seth's turn to suss whether a gold watch is priceless or worthless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cash Kings: An out-of-character Les makes an impulse decision that threatens to backfire, and later gives a big loan to a customer with a dubious sob story. Has he been fleeced? (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Hoopty Dreams: The buyers head to Fort Worth, where Victor seeks an ally in his bidding war with Ricky and Bubba. Others learn that two heads aren't always better than one. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Take A Deep Breath, It's Lesa: The bidding action moves to Conroe where the buyers find themselves face to face with an old adversary. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Hoarder Patrol: The buyers compete with huge crowds in Hallsville, where Mary and Moe go all out on a locker they know will make Moe's wife angry. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Throw Momma From The Auction: Moe gets on the wrong side of Mary when he buys a risky locker in Lancaster. Jenny causes a stir when she brings her mother to the auction. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole and restorers Allen Millyard and Guy Willison visit autojumbles in Stratford-upon-Avon and Enfield. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: CodE.T.: When Cody gets sick, the kids want to send a message back to his home planet in the hope that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favour of the plan. (S3 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Quiche it Goodbye: When an 'evil conglomerate' is threatening to take over Chef's favourite childhood restaurant, Owen rallies the kids to take them down. (S3 Ep25)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: A Song of Ice and Fire Noodles: When Gwen loses her ice powers from eating spicy ramen, she takes desperate measures to get them back. (S1 Ep109)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Anubis Newbie: An ancient Anubis king tests Miguel to see if he's ready to leave Mythlandia and become the next ruler. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The A-bok-bok-bokalypse: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologise for past misdeeds and hopefully procure an antidote before it's too late! (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pinata Regatta: Izzy can't bring herself to smash a pinata during Cinco de Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed pinata comes to life and spawns an evil pinata army, it's batter up. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Fountain Of Too Much Youth: When Miguel discovers his favourite malt is now on the kids menu, he drinks from the Fountain of Youth to get younger. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno disgyblion Ysgol Gynradd Gymraeg Garth Olwg i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a treasure.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tn a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tn and friends in the village.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pan mae creision yn mynd i bobman mae'n rhaid i Pablo a'r anifeiliaid deithio i ben mynydd, i waelod y mr, ac i'r lleuad i'w cael nhw nl. Pablo opens a packet of crisps too fast - uh-oh!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Toad yn cael gwared ar hen gadair esmwyth, mae'n difaru ar unwaith. The Weasels have claimed Toad's old chair - can he get it back?

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Ar l cael ei fesur, mae Bledd yn deffro i ddarganfod efallai ei fod wedi tyfu gormod. After being measured, Bledd wakes up to discover he may have grown too much.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae sianeli teledu Ocido wedi drysu'n ln ac mae'n rhaid i Blero a'i ffrindiau ddatrys y broblem. All Ocido's television channels are completely mixed up and Blero has to fix the problem.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Deian a Loli heddiw, tybed? What's happening in Deian and Loli's world today?

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae meddwl Mwmintrol yn dechrau chwarae triciau arno pan yn aros gartre ar ben ei hun dros nos am y tro cynta. Moomintrol's worst fears come true as he sees nightmarish creature, The Ghost!

programme.title: Chwarter Call
programme.desc: Digonedd o hwyl a chwerthin gyda'r band Poer Poeth, Teulu'r Oddams a Bari Bargen. Join Cadi, Luke, Jed and Miriam in the comedy series Chwarter Call.

programme.title: LEGO Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Tra bod y merched yn cefnogi Stephanie maen 'nhw'n gweld bod na chwaraewyr yn twyllo! Stephanie's competitive side gives the girls a front row seat to a cheating scandal.

programme.title: PwySutPam?
programme.desc: Yn yr ail bennod o'r gyfres cawn wybod mwy am gewri tawel ein byd, sef coed, a pham ei fod mor bwysig ein bod yn eu gwarchod. We learn about the silent giants of our world - trees.

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life - but she also has super powers!

programme.title: CIC
programme.desc: Lloyd sy'n ymuno sesiwn ymarfer tm hoci Cymru, sgiliau hoci ia gyda thm Paralympaidd y Cardiff Huskies, profi oerfel siambr cryotherapy a chriw hoci Pwllheli yw'r Sgwad. Today: hockey.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Miss Enfys am roi ei gwers ioga cyntaf i Gari Gofalwr ond mae'r sesiwn yn mynd yn anniben tu hwnt! Miss Enfys attempts to teach yoga to Gari Gofalwr but the session turns into chaos! [SL]

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Yr olaf o'r gyfres: bydd y tm yn creu trefniant i ddathlu 20ml o elusen Prostate Cymru. Last in the series: the team create a display to celebrate 20 years of the Prostate Cymru charity. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Lowrie, cyn-athrawes gynradd, sydd yn y stiwdio heddiw ac mae angen help Cadi ac Owain arni i ffeindio gwisg addas ar gyfer siarad gydag elusen sy'n agos iawn at ei chalon. Styling show. [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sydd yn 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a'r Gelli Gandryll sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. This time, join Geraint Hardy as he discovers what Hay on Wye has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Mae'r pobyddion sy'n weddill yn creu cacennau arallfydol fel rhan o'u hymdrech i aros yn yr Academi. Four starry eyed bakers create out-of-this-world cakes in the series semi final. [SL]

programme.title: Cais Quinnell
programme.desc: Yr wythnos hon, mae Scott yn rhoi cynnig ar nofio awyr agored yng nghwmni Lisa Jn. This week, Scott gives a helping hand at an animal park, and joins in a Taiko drumming session. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Ar Sgwrs Dan y Lloer gynta'r gyfres, cawn ymweld gardd a chartref yr actores, Bethan Ellis Owen. In the latest series of Sgwrs Dan y Lloer, Elin Fflur chats with actress Bethan Elis Owen. [SL]

programme.title: Siwrna Scandi Chris
programme.desc: Mae Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts ar siwrna Scandi, yn profi a'n coginio'r gorau o fwydydd Norwy. Welsh fire chef Chris 'Flamebaster' Roberts starts his epic Scandi food journey inNorway. [SL]

programme.title: Am Dro!
programme.desc: Tro hwn, awn ar daith i Ddolaucothi, Pumsaint; o Lanrug i Lanberis; i Abertawe; ac i bentre Corris. Gareth, Moli, Ffion & Gareth take us to Pumsaint, Llanrug-Llanberis, Swansea & Corris. [SL]

programme.title: Ysbyty: Plant Ni
programme.desc: Am y tro cyntaf, cawn gipolwg tu l i'r llenni ar un o Wardiau Plant prysuraf Gogledd Cymru, yn Ysbyty Glan Clwyd. A behind the scenes look at the busy Children's Ward at Ysbyty Glan Clwyd. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno thm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy. [SL]

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Scarlets v Leinster
programme.desc: Gm bencampwriaeth rygbi fyw rhwng y Scarlets a Leinster ym Mharc y Scarlets. C/G 17.15. Live URC game between Scarlets and Leinster at Parc y Scarlets. K/O 17.15.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas: Pale Hall
programme.desc: Beti George a Huw Stephens sy'n ymweld rhai o westai a bwytai gorau'r wlad. Tro hwn, mae'r ddau yng ngwesty 5 seren moethus Pal Hall. New travel series. This time, we visit Pale Hall.

programme.title: Alun, Chris a Kiri yn Seland Newydd
programme.desc: Ar l pysgota amkouramewn moroedd garw, mae'r tri'n blasu gwin enwog Marlborough. The trio seek out the Southern Hemisphere's only Welsh bar, and train with a local women's rugby team.

programme.title: Strip
programme.desc: Mae criw o stripwyr yn anelu at roi Rhyl yn l ar y map gyda'u clybiau strip unigryw. A group of strippers aim to put Rhyl back on the map with their unique pop-up strip clubs.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Gweilch v Dreigiau
programme.desc: Cyfle i weld y gm bencampwriaeth rygbi Gweilch v Dreigiau a chwaraewyd yn gynharach heddiw yn Stadiwm Swansea.com. An opportunity to see the URC Ospreys v Dragons game played earlier today.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo Williams yn ffarwelio 'r mamaliaid ac yn crynhoi'r hyn rydyn ni wedi'i ddysgu wrth sbecian yn eu cartrefi ffug. Iolo Williams bids farewell to the mammals living in the burrows.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Home Shopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Home Shopping.

programme.desc: ..programmes start at 6.00am

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cyfarfod ffrind newydd, Gwyrdd. Blue and Yellow meet a new friend - Green.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Ysgol Pwll Coch sy'n help yng Ngwesty Sigldigwt heddiw a byddwn yn cwrdd ag Annie a Megan sy'n berchen ceffylau. We meet Annie and Megan who both own horses.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae ymbarel Tanwen, cyflwynydd y tywydd, wedi torri. Mae hi'n gwneud apl yn fyw ar y teledu ac aiff Harri ac Alex i'w helpu. Tanwen, the weather forecaster's umbrella has broken. Help!

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn clywed llais o grombil twnnel creigiog. Maen nhw'n ymchwilio a'n dysgu bo synau'n gallu bownsio! The Woohoos hear a voice coming from inside a rocky tunnel and investigate!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Mario'n ceisio ei orau glas i gasglu cnau cyll ond mae gan y wiwer syniadau ei hun. Mario's efforts to forage for hazelnuts are thwarted by a mischievous squirrel.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae caws yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel y ffermwr hud yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio iddi. Today, Nel wants to know where cheese comes from.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae'r bobol Uwchben y Pridd yn gadael sbwriel ymhobman ar l cynnal cyngerdd ac felly mae'r tyrchod yn elwa wrth ei gasglu. The moles take advantage of collecting and recycling litter.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Crwbi y crwban yn dangos i Joni rhinwedd pwyllo, a daw hynny'n allweddol i drechu'r dihiryn Beti Bowen. Jet-boy's turtle, Crwbi, shows him the key to defeating the villain Beti Bowen.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn down i nabod y Piranha, y Melfroch a'r Bolgi. This time we learn about the Pirahna, the Honey badger and the Wolverine.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Al yn peintio'r ysgubor, mae'n rhaid i'w hanifeiliaid fynd ar wyliau dros nos. Ond mae 'na broblem. When Al needs to paint the barn the animals have to go on a sleepover!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ln Las sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ln Las join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Sut bydd bywyd ar y ddaear yn dod i ben? Pa fygythiadau sydd i'n byd? How will life on Earth come to an end? What are the threats that could destroy our world?

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Adam yng Ngorslas, ac fe fydd digonedd o gyngor am blannu tatws! Over in Ruthin Sioned celebrates Easter with a Spring bouquet, and Meinir creates a bog garden.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae Trystan ac Emma yn helpu teulu a ffrindiau Nia a Geraint, sy'n benderfynol mai Gwesty Bae Oxwich fydd lleoliad eu priodas. This time, the crew help Nia and Geraint from Lower Brynamman.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlu'r Pasg yn Llyn ac Eifionydd - canu o Gapel y Traeth, Cricieth a perfformiadau gan Mared Williams, Arfon Wyn, ac ensemble lleisiol Glanaethwy. We celebrate Easter in Llyn ac Eifionydd.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Dathlu taith trawsnewid Dylan, Sharon, Arwel, Gwawr a Becky wrth i ni edrych nl dros ddeufis o ddilyn cynllun iach Ty Ffit. Season finale celebrating the gang's transformative journey.

programme.title: Y Fets
programme.desc: Ers dros canrif, mae milfeddygon Ystwyth Fets wedi brwydro'n ddi-ddiwedd i edrych ar l anifeiliaid Ceredigion - ac mae'r cameru yn l. The cameras are back at Ystwyth Fets, Aberystwyth.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd chymeriadau cwmni busnes cymunedol pentref Pisgah, Aberystwyth sy'n casglu a gwasgu afalau lleol er mwyn gwerthu seidr Pisgah Chi. We visit Aberystwyth's Pisgah Chi cider company.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With onscreen English subtitles.

programme.title: Sgorio: Wrecsam v Caerdydd
programme.desc: Rownd Derfynol Cwpan Cymru Bute Energy '24/25 rhwng Wrecsam a Chaerdydd yn fyw o Rodney Parade. C/G 17.15. The live '24/25 Bute Energy Welsh Cup final between Wrexham and Cardiff. K/O 17.15.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: MaeHeledd, Iestyn a Ffion yn dod i adnabod ardal Rhosllanerchrugog - cymuned gyda llawer o hanes, diwylliant a diwydiant ar ffin Cymru - Lloegr. We discover more about Rhosllanerchrugog.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Mae Barry'n cymryd safiad cadarn i adennill rheolaeth, mae Roberts yn gwneud aberth i ryddhau ffrind, a daw Peter i wybod y gwir am ei ffrind da. Barry takes a firm stand to regain control.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Mae Heddlu Gogledd Cymru yn darganfod gang troseddol sy'n defnyddio plentyn i werthu cyffuriau. North Wales Police discover a criminal gang are trafficking a young boy to sell drugs.

programme.title: Cartrefi Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfres lle bydd Aled Samuel a'r hanesydd adeiladau, Bethan Scorey, yn edrych ar wahanol fathau o gartrefi yng Nghymru. Y tro hwn: bythynnod. This time, we focus on cottages.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, ry ni ym Mhontyberem ac Aneirin Karadog sy'n rhannu cefndir enw a bywyd cymunedol y pentre. This week the Welsh Whisperer travels to Carmarthenshire's largest village, Pontyberem.

programme.title: They Live
programme.desc: 1988. Sci-fi Horror. Directed by John Carpenter. Stars Roddy Piper, Keith David & Meg Foster. A homeless drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses capable of showing the world the way it truly is. [S]

programme.title: Woman On The Run
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by Norman Foster. Stars Ann Sheridan, Dennis O'Keefe & Robert Keith. An eyewitness to a murder is pursued by his wife, the police and the killer around San Francisco. [S]

programme.title: Time Warp
programme.desc: 1981. Sci-Fi. While seeking a cosmic black hole, an astronaut discovers a time warp. Stars Adam West and Gretchen Corbett. Written By Anne Spielberg. Directed by: Robert Emenegger and Allan Sandler.

programme.title: The Stolen Jools
programme.desc: 1931. Comedy. Director William McGann & Victor Heerman. Stars Norma Shearer, Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, Buster Keaton & Edward G. Robinson. A police inspector searches Hollywood for stolen pearls. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Wind Up Week. 1964. Narrated by Richard Greene. It's 1938. The barriers in Austria are raised to allow German troops in, the Japanese crush the Chinese and the war in Spain draws to a close. [S]

programme.title: The Price of Silence
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Director: Montgomery Tully. Stars Gordon Jackson, June Thorburn & Mary Clare. Roger forges a new life for himself after his release from prison. But his past catches up with him. [S]

programme.title: Kitchen Magic
programme.desc: 1963. Directed by Dennis Shand. A gas council advert film with Fanny and Johnnie Cradock demonstrating some 1960s cookery.

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. End of the Line. Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Robot Revolution. 1963. Stars Ronnie Stevens, Libby Morris & Murray Kash. When an eruption at the Atlantic Sea Farm damages robot workers, Space Headquarters becomes overrun by the machines. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Yegg Foes in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Gail Hire. The city's ownership has reverted to Egghead, who fires all city officials and opens the metropolis to the underworld. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Pirate King. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Martin Benson & Trader Faulkner. Richard's skill at chess and duelling is put to the test when he is challenged by the infamous pirate Forked Beard. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: Rescue. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. On its maiden flight, Supercar, piloted by Mike Mercury, is sent to rescue brothers Bill and Jimmy Gibson who are adrift at sea. [S]

programme.title: The Dog and the Diamonds
programme.desc: 1953. Family. Directed by Ralph Thomas. Stars Kathleen Harrison & George Coulouris. A group of children create their own zoo in the garden of a disused house - which is also a hideout for thieves. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Reluctant Rebel. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Leslie Phillips & John Carson. Sir Geoffrey and his servant disguise themselves as outlaws and join Robin's gang to get some insight for a journal. [S]

programme.title: Atomic Rulers
programme.desc: 1965. Sci-fi. Directed by Koreyoshi Akasaka, Teruo Ishii & Akira Mitsuwa. Stars Ken Utsui & Sachihiro Ohsawa. Starman is sent to Earth after learning of a devastating plot to destroy the planet. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Dead Part of the House.1959. Starring Philip Abbott, Joanne Linville and Mimi Gibson. After the death of her mother, a young girl makes friends with three mysterious dolls in the nursery... [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Mystery of the TA2. 1963. Stars Paul Maxwell & John Bluthal. The crew find the wreck of a rocket that exploded 50 years ago. Assuming the pilot is alive, the team travel to an icy planet to find him.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Renegade Rocket. 1968. Stars Cy Grant, Donald Gray & Paul Maxwell. When the Mysterons gain control of a rocket, Captains Scarlet and Blue must find a way to stop it before it reaches its target.

programme.title: Night Train for Inverness
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Stars Norman Wooland, Jane Hylton & Dennis Waterman. An ex-convict kidnaps his son and takes him on a train to Inverness, unaware he is putting his son's life in danger. [S]

programme.title: The Long Arm
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Charles Frend. Stars Jack Hawkins, John Stratton, Dorothy Alison & Michael Brooke. The sleuths of Scotland Yard try to solve a series of burglaries. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Plumbing the Depths
programme.desc: 1962. A insightful study of nautical charts and the men who make them, and their history, with a look at the part played by HMS Vidal in the surveying.

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Hunch. 1976. Stars Shirley Allen & Hetty Baynes. When a girl goes missing, door-to-door inquiries lead nowhere, but Haggar has a lead on stolen cameras, taking the case in an unexpected direction. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: One of Ours. Creator: John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. David's bombing raid goes horribly awry on the return to Britain. Fred confronts Sheila over her relationship with Bob. [S]

programme.title: An Affair in Mind
programme.desc: 1988. Crime Drama. Directed by Colin Luke. Stars Amanda Donohoe, Stephen Dillane & Hilary Mason. A young novelist falls for a married woman, who then wants him to kill her husband. [S]

programme.title: Castaway (1986)
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director: Nicolas Roeg. Stars Oliver Reed, Amanda Donohoe & Georgina Hale. A young woman seeking adventure volunteers to spend a year on a deserted island with a middle aged man. [S]

programme.title: Castaway (1986)
programme.desc: 1986. Adventure. Director: Nicolas Roeg. Stars Oliver Reed, Amanda Donohoe & Georgina Hale. A young woman seeking adventure volunteers to spend a year on a deserted island with a middle aged man. [S]

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: 1997. Crime Drama. Directed by Jack Gold. Stars John Thaw, Tom Towndrow & Abigail Cruttenden. A British expatriate in Rhodes investigates the mysterious disappearance of a woman he had befriended.

programme.title: Force on Thunder Mountain
programme.desc: 1978. Sci-Fi. A hiking trip into the mountains brings father and son into contact with the Force. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life A Load of Pheasants
programme.desc: 1969. A look at intercontinental deliveries by lorries that travel through Britain's ferry ports and the problems faced, with a focus on the journey of a lorry driver delivering pheasants abroad.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Fishing for Barbel and Ferreting. 1980. Jack travels to the lower Hampshire Avon in search of Barbel and goes ferreting with Fred Taylor, president of the Ferreting Association of Great Britain. [S]

programme.title: Birmingham Bullring Promo 1964
programme.desc: 1964. Let's take a trip to Birmingham, in this brilliant reel about the 'new' Bull Ring shopping centre.

programme.title: Dick Tracy's G-Men
programme.desc: 1939. Action. Directors: John English & William Witney. Stars Ralph Byrd, Irving Pichel & Ted Pearson. A mad doctor uses a drug to bring himself back from the dead after his execution in prison. [S]

programme.title: Beneath the 12 Mile Reef
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Directed by Robert D. Webb. Stars Robert Wagner, Terry Moore & Gilbert Roland. Fierce competition among sponge fishermen leads to a dangerous rivalry between two families. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly Races Jethrine. 1962. Stars Irene Ryan, Donna Douglas & Louis Nye. When Sonny Drysdale promises to give Elly May a ring, Granny thinks he's going to propose and becomes a matchmaker. [S]

programme.title: Warn That Man
programme.desc: 1943. Comedy Thriller. Director: Lawrence Huntington. Stars: Gordon Harker, Raymond Lovell & Jean Kent. During WW II, an impersonator takes part in a German attempt to kidnap Winston Churchill. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1961. The Never Never Murder. Directed by Peter Duffell. Starring Russell Napier, Genine Graham and Maurice Good. A dead body sets the police on the track of a fraudster. (S1, E37)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Yegg Foes in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Gail Hire. The city's ownership has reverted to Egghead, who fires all city officials and opens the metropolis to the underworld. [S]

programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: 1967. Western. Director: Sergio Corbucci. Stars Joseph Cotten, Norma Bengell & Julian Mateos. The Civil War is over, and the South has fallen, but Col. Jonas has a plan to revive the Confederacy. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Press Button Farms
programme.desc: 1967. A captivating look at the revolution in farm machinery and how a farm can be run almost single handed with the help of so many new machines.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Oath. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Alexander Gauge & John Arnatt. The Deputy Sheriff attempts to trick Friar Tuck in order to prove that the priest colludes with the outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Romney Marsh/Pumpkins. 1986. Jack looks back at a sunny visit to Kent when he tried to photograph a 'flying frog' on Romney Marsh, and he visits a village pumpkin fair. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: Mike and Noel bring news from Tunbridge Wells, wallow in the astounding footage of the building of Rugby's Plaza Cinema and talk the label machines that graced our railway platforms in the 60s. [S]

programme.title: Appointment with Venus
programme.desc: 1951. War. Director: Ralph Thomas. Stars: David Niven, Glynis Johns & George Coulouris. During WWII, a British Major is tasked with rescuing a pedigree cow from a German-occupied Channel Island. [S]

programme.title: In The Can
programme.desc: 1961. A charming short film about canned foods, and the processes behind the scenes.

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: The Wall. Stars John Gregson, Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. Netta's husband Michael has a big win on the football pools but then disappears. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club

programme.title: Budgie

programme.title: The Nudist Story
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director: Ramsey Herrington. Stars Shelley Martin, Brian Cobby, Natalie Lynn. A woman is horrified when she inherits a nudist camp but her views are challenged when she falls in love. [S]

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Call of the Feather: Jean-Claude dreams of having a cowboy hat like his friend Billy. But it's not easy to find a hat that's the right size for an earthworm! (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: A Foggy Mystery: This morning, Billy wants to take Old Jack some nuts, but Scott refuses to let him go: it's misty outside and he might get lost. But Billy insists. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Card Duel: Jean-Claude and Suzie come bursting into the ranch to help Billy eat his cereal, in the hope that they'll find the twelfth and final Jessy Dog collector's card. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Litterhorns: When Ike Tinhorn decides that it's easier to dispose of their garbage near Crystal Creek, it spoils the drinking water for dinosaurs downstream. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: One Very Special Bronto: When Clover tries to be the Ranch's protector like Biscuit, he fails to notice that a T-Rex needs his help. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Dino Ranchers- Roll!: When a T-Rex needs to be rescued, Miguel is confident that his untested new Dino Rumbler is up to the task, but Jon and Min are worried. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Risk it for Biscuit: Out on a mission together, Jon is so keen to impress Biscuit that he causes problems by jumping too quickly into the lead rather than listening and working as a team. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Dino-SOAR!: When the Jr Ranchers attend the Dino Port's Flyer and Rescue training school, learning to fly new pterosaurs and operate their rescue vehicles. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Big Jon Big Trouble: Jon's enthusiasm gets the best of him when he tries to tame a rambunctious dinosaur all by himself. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Min's Quest: When Min overcomes adversity to find an elusive flower, she helps to cure an ailing mother brontosaurus and learns that perseverance always pays off. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Wranglin' Thunderfoot: When Jon wrongly accuses Thunderfoot of scaring their dino herds, he creates trouble for Thunderfoot and for himself. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Wings Over Dino Ranch: When the Tinhorn Trio pick a field of glowing moon lilies, they accidentally prevent a flock of pterosaurs from finding their way home at night. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Pasta La Vista: Who is the best cook in all the forest? Masha or Dasha? As usual, Bear will have to solve the girls' dispute. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: Life Is Beautiful: In the Middle Age, Molang and Piu Piu can be counted on to entertain the king. Even when he's sad? Fortunately, our two friends know exactly what to do to cheer him up! (S5 Ep1)
